title: Push Comedy Class Sale
description:
Give the gift of Push Comedy this holiday season!

In addition to our weekly shows we also teach classes for adults AND children!

Are you a comedy nerd who watches old SNL skits and UCB videos on YouTube all day? A young professional trying to meet more people in the area but not sure that a kickball league is the right fit? A parent looking for creative outlets for their children? ALL THREE?

Push Comedy is the place for you. All of our classes are taught in a non-judgmental environment where the students build confidence, make friends, and most importantly - have fun!



Adult classes are 6 weeks and cost $185 ($25 off our regular price) and our teen and pre-teen courses are 6 weeks for $155 (also $25 off)!!! 



Got questions? We (usually) have answers - feel free to email marketing@pushcomedytheater.com any of your questions, comments, concerns, or the gnawing thoughts that keep you up at night.

This class voucher is good for any (1) class offered at Push Comedy Theater in Norfolk, VA through July 31, 2019. (You've got 6 months to pick a class to take!)

Give the gift of laughter | Give the gift of community | Give the gift of Push

title: Harold Night
description:
It's Harold Night at the Push Comedy Theater!

So who the heck is Harold? More accurately the question should be... what the heck is a Harold?

The Harold is the big, bad grand daddy of all long form improv! It starts with an audience suggestion, then improvisers weave together scenes, characters and group games to create a seamless piece. It can be bizarre and magical, baffling and amazing... it definitely needs to be seen.

Harold Night

Free show!!!

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.



--

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: It's A Girl-Prov Christmas!
description:
Celebrate the Holidays with Hampton Road's funniest females!!!

GirlProv is an all-female improv show, making audiences lose it with laughter at the Push Comedy Theater.

It's a Christmas slumber party meets night out on the town meets sorority house party! 

It's A Girl-Prov Christmas!
Friday, December 20th
The show starts at 8, tickets are $5

Push Comedy Theater
763 Granby Street 
Norfolk, VA
pushcomedytheater.com

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: The Best of SKETCHMAGEDDON
description:
2019 has been an amazing year for sketch comedy and SKETCHMAGEDDON.  Now catch 2 of the best!!!

Get ready for the Best of Sketchmageddon with The Dumpster Dudes and Character Assassination.

-The Dumpster Dudes have been delivering some of the most innovative and hilarious sketch comedy all year long.  Now see some of the best.

-Character Assassination debuted at the last Sketchmageddon.  If you missed it, you missed one the best perfomances of the entire year.  Character Assassination mixes comedy, music and dance to create a memorable and dynamic experience.

---

Don't miss this epic sketch comedy showdown, where truly anything can happen.  And we do mean anything!!!  Sometimes it's funny, sometimes it's weird, it's always entertaining.

SKETCHMAGEDDON!!!!

Get ready for a sketch comedy show like no other!!!

SKETCHMAGEDDON takes three groups and forces them to compete in an all-out comedy deathmatch!

Each team will be given 15 minutes to dazzle you with their comedy prowess. It's Saturday Night Live meets Thunderdome!!!!

Unlike its improvised sister show IMPROVAGEDDON, SKETCHMAGEDDON features all written and rehearsed material.  Props, costumes, and special effects are all legal in SKETCHMAGEDDON.

This is a completely experimental show.  You never know what you are going to see.

------------

The Best of SKETCHMAGEDDON!!!

Friday, December 20th at 10pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: A Very Push Comedy Christmas
description:
Remember all those wonderful Christmas Specials you loved as a kid?

Remember the singing and the dancing and the loads of holiday cheer?



We sure do!



That's why we're proud to present our very own warped version of those timeless, holiday classics...

A Very PushComedy Christmas: An Inappropriate Comedy Show.



We've gathered some of Hampton Roads funniest talent:

ComicKaze Sketch Comedy, Sketch Me Like One of Your French Girls, Rebekah Rickards, Sketch Me Outside: A Variety Show, The Bright Side Sketch & Improv Comedy and more!!!



Plus it wouldn't be a Hampton Roads' Christmas without The Pushers!!!



Don't miss what's become one of Hampton Roads' greatest holiday traditions.



A Very Push Comedy Christmas: An Inappropriate Comedy Show

Saturday, December 21st

Tickets are $12

Push Comedy Theater

763 Granby Street

Norfolk, VA

757-333-7442

pushcomedytheater.com



The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: Holiday Cheer-prov featuring Hug it Out and The Living Room
description:
Hug it Out 
It’s time for some real feels! It’s time to Hug it Out!  

Hug it Out is the brainchild of Ed Carden, John Regan Wharton, and Lindsay Horne. It’s a different kind of improv show, one that aims to create compelling dramatic scenes based on personal struggles and vulnerabilities. Ed and John will get an emotion from the audience, and then create a single uninterrupted scene based on their own personal stories. This scene will be emotional, at times intense, maybe comedic, maybe not!   

Get ready to experience another side of improv. Get ready for all the feels! Get ready for Hug it Out.  
——————  
The Living Room 
What goes together better than oversharing and improv comedy? We invite you into The Living Room.  

Based on your suggestion, a group of improv comedians will share real stories from their life and then use those as inspiration to jump into comedy scenes made up right on the spot! TRUE STORY! Will it get too personal? Will it get awkward? Will that lead to hilariousness? PROBABLY, DEFINITELY, AND YES!!!

Holiday Cheer-prov featuring Hug it Out and The Living Room
Saturday, December 21st
Tickets are $5

title: The New Faces of Comedy with The Green Team
description:
Get ready for the next wave of comedy.



The New Faces of Comedy is a showcase for the newest, up and coming talent the Push Comedy Theater has to offer.



This month don't miss improv from The Green Team.  Get ready as The Green Team gives you a fast paced, high octane dose of Whose Line is it Anyway style improv.  The Green Team is a brand new group of fresh faced improvisers who are mentored by some great Push Comedy veterans.



Here comes the future... The Green Team.



The New Faces of Comedy with The Green Team

Last Thursday of the Month at 8pm

title: The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show
description:
Get ready for short form (Whose Line is it Anyway?) improv at the Push Comedy Theater.

You demanded it! So now it's here!!! Our very own short form improv show. All the fun of Whose Line is it Anyway... right here in Downtown Norfolk.

The Improv Riot: The Short Form Improv Show

The last Friday of every month, 8pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

description:
It's your favorite short-form improv show... with a twist.

The Improv Riot After Dark takes all your fun improv games and gives them an adult spin.  Where the regular Improv Riot tries to stay PG13ish, Improv Riot After Dark will definitely be R rated.

title: Fake News The Musical
description:
Ripped from today's headlines!!!!

Fake News the Musical is a fully improvised, musical news show. The audience supplies the headlines, we sing the news.

The day's top stories never sounded so good.

Don't miss this amazing show as they debut a brand new cast.

Fake News the Musical

Tickets are $5.

title: IMPROVAGEDDON: THE ULTIMATE IMPROV COMPETITION
description:
Prepare for Glory!!

Prepare for IMPROVAGEDDON: The Ultimate Improv Competition!!!

Who will raise the Hammer of Lowell in final victory? You'll have to come to this month's show to find out!

3 teams will be given just 15 minutes to perform any style of improv comedy they choose... all in a quest to be declared Improvageddon champ and raise the Hammer of Lowell in final victory.

This ain't your daddy's Improv cage match! If you think you've seen Improv competitions before then you ain't seen nothin yet!

Improvageddon combines Improv Comedy with stylistic elements of Professional Wrestling to create a truly unique, and most definitely over-the-top Improv contest.

Gimmicks will be displayed! Trash will be talked! Feats of comedic strength will be performed!

Let the final war for comedic supremacy begin!

IMPROVAGEDDON: The Ultimate Improv Competition!The last Saturday of every month

The show starts at 10:00pm

Tickets are $5

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: The Pushie Awards Show
description:
Imagine the Oscars, the Emmys, the Tonys and Nickelodeon Kid's Choice Awards all rolled into one!

Well imagine no more... because the Push Comedy Theater is proud to announce The Fourth Annual Pushie Awards!!!

The Pushie Awards are our chance to honor some of the funniest performers, shows and moments of 2019.

Stay tuned for the full list of awards and nominees.

Like all award shows, this night will be full of pomp and circumstance, surprise guest stars, wonderful food and amazing performances.

The Pushie Awards will be held on Tuesday, December 31st from 4 to 9pm.

Don't miss on of the biggest comedy events of the year!!!

*********************************

The Pushie Awards Show

Monday, December 31st at 5pm

Tickets are $45 in advance, $60 the night of the show.



Push Comedy Theater

763 Granby Street

Norfolk, VA

757-333-7442

pushcomedytheater.com

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

title: The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery
description:
Who Dunnit: The Improvised Murder Mystery is now The Unusual Suspects... new name, same great show.

The hottest show in the history of the 757 is NOW A NATIONALLY TOURING SHOW!

The Unusual Suspects

There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect. The actors on stage. Even you.

Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.

Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.

You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.

No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Join us at the hit show that’s played to sold-out audiences for more than three years and counting. This isn’t your standard dinner detective fare; get ready for a wild and funny night that everyone will be talking about the next day, your family, your friends, and maybe even your priest.

The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery Comedy

The second Saturday of every month at the Push Comedy Theater

The show starts at 8pm, tickets are $15

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: Improv 201: Scene Work and Short Form Games
description:
Improv 201: Scene Work and Short Form Games



This course builds upon the fundamentals and skills learned in 101. Students will focus on scene work, specifically building believable characters, strong relationships, and establishing baseline reality.

Students will also train in a variety of short form improv games similar to the ones seen on Whose Line is it Anyway.



This is a 6 week class at the Push Comedy Theater Training Center

Cost $210



This class will be held from 6:30-9:30pm on Wednesday nights from January 29th through March 4th.



Push Comedy Theater Training Center

2710 Granby Street . Norfolk

--

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting and film production.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

--

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting and film production.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.
